title: Luis Portillo (boxer)
text: Luis Portillo (born 29 September 1956) is an Argentine <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201976%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20welterweight">men's light welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1976%20Summer%20Olympics">1976 Summer Olympics</a>.
